Blog.post: WILMINGTON DELAWARE - 1996 BAAAADDDD DRIVERS, and LOTS OF HOMOSEXUALS sunbathing on NUDE beaches... Friday-11pm My hubby and I stop for fast food at a Taco Bell. As we near the ordering counter we notice two faggy lovers NUDE, and wearing only silver belts around their hairy, and bloated lower waists. The lady cashier looking quite shocked bolted to the back of the store half laughing- half shaking... The food prep boy clothed in tattoos of black widows continued to wrap his corn shells. The cute little 16 or so year old cleaning boy was laughing so hard that he spilled the mop bucket, and slipped on his own slippery floor. A shout came from behind the steamers-- WILL SOMEONE PLEASE GO UP FRONT AND TAKE THE ORDERS? Humm- No store manager managing this Taco Bell... Cute cleaning boy responds with a shout of extreme laughter-- I'LL TAKE THE ORDERS- Red faced-and tearing with laughter he steps up to the cash register and asks- May I take your order,please? Short gay responds while licking his upper lip- Um- Doth the # 2 value meal have any rithe? Boy responds with uncontrollable laughter- Yes- Why? Short gay answers- Well- Sthee-- I can't eat rithe-- Rithe makesss me sthick... Tall gay partner runs his bright sparkly pink fingernails through his lover's hair, and winks at boy cashier saying- Pleasth don't give him any rithe--He'll throw uuup... Boy cashier nods his head-- Alright! Ha ha-- No problem. The two nude lovers finally end up ordering 10 regular tacos and turn together with tall one holding tray while short one wraps his arms around his lovers pimpled, nude rear end, and they walk gracefully over to the middle of the dining area and take a seat. My hubby and I place our order and are nearing the exit when two cops enter. The two lovers leap from their sweaty seats for a quick getaway. Officer 1 calmly chewing on a piece of gum shakes his head in disbelief and is saying something to the two lovers. The short one gets down on the ground and starts crying. The tall one is pointing a finger at officer 1. Then officer 2 cuffs tall lover and smiles at officer 1. Officer 1 cuffs short lover while he is kicking like a baby having his diaper changed. Taxi Cab Confessions would divorce Vegas and marry Wilmington Deleware... Oh-- and of course you don't like my PINK text.

August-2003 Winston Salem NC What a beautiful sunny Saturday for a family picnic. My two brothers are on their way back home from Winston when they spot a Happy,Hungry-Chinese Family having a picnic atop a run-away truck ramp. Red Checkered Plastic Table Cloth- White Plastic Chairs-KFC-Steamed Rice- Chopsticks-Smiles- and All. What?? Uh Huh-- They actually took the fortune cookie too seriously when it read: You will ruv America-Your whole famiry will be picinica suicide at top truck ramp-View Of interstate-viewtiful...Why big truck exit dis one? Ah--AMERICA--Land Of The Free-- AND--Home Of The Idiots. ???STRAAAANGE???
